panels.description: Aggregated status of Airlock Microgateway resources.
panels.title: System Status

panels.description: Total number of requests processed by Airlock Microgateway.

targets.expr:
round(sum(increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}",namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[$__range]))+
sum(increase(microgateway_http_downstream_rq_threats_blocked_total{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[$__range]) or on() vector(0)))

panels.title: Requests

panels.description: Ratio of blocked requests vs. processed requests by Airlock Microgateway.

targets.expr:
sum(increase(microgateway_http_downstream_rq_threats_blocked_total{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}",gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[$__range]) or on() vector(0))
/ 
(
sum(increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[$__range]))
+
sum(increase(microgateway_http_downstream_rq_threats_blocked_total{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[$__range]) or on() vector(0))
)

panels.title: % Blocked Requests

panels.description: Requests per second processed by Airlock Microgateway along with the corresponding block rate.

targets.expr:
sum(rate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[1m]))
+
sum(rate(microgateway_http_downstream_rq_threats_blocked_total{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[1m]) or on() vector(0))

sum(rate(microgateway_http_downstream_rq_threats_blocked_total{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[1m]) or on() vector(0))
/
(
sum(rate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[1m]))
+
sum(rate(microgateway_http_downstream_rq_threats_blocked_total{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[1m]) or on() vector(0))
)

panels.title: Requests vs. % Blocks

panels.description: Threats blocked by Airlock Microgateway categorized by their corresponding block type.

targets.expr: sum by (block_type) (increase(microgateway_http_downstream_rq_threats_blocked_total{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[1m] offset -1m))/(60000/$__interval_ms)

panels.title: Blocked Threats by Block Type

panels.description: Percentiles of the application downstream latency over one minute.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.25, sum(rate(envoy_http_downstream_rq_time_bucket{envoy_http_conn_manager_prefix="http", managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}"}[1m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(envoy_http_downstream_rq_time_bucket{envoy_http_conn_manager_prefix="http", managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}"}[1m])) by (le))

panels.title: Application Downstream Latency

panels.description: Percentiles of the Airlock Microgateway processing time over one minute.
panels.title: Airlock Microgateway Processing Time

list.description: Allows filtering on the gateway kind.
list.label: Gateway Kind
list.name: gateway_kind

list.description: Allows filtering on the managing operator instance.
list.label: Microgateway Operator
list.name: operator

list.description: Allows filtering on the namespaces in which gateways are deployed.
list.label: Gateway Namespace
list.name: namespace

list.description: Allows filtering on specific gateway instance names within the selected namespaces.
list.label: Gateway Name
list.name: gateway_name

list.description: Allows filtering request metrics of the selected SidecarGateway instances on application container port. This filter is ignored for other gateway kinds.
list.label: Sidecar Application Port
list.name: sidecar_application_port

list.description: Allows filtering request metrics of the selected Gateway instances on the name of their matching HTTPRoute. This filter is ignored for other gateway kinds.
list.label: Gateway HTTPRoute
list.name: gateway_httproute
